Name: Tower Of God: One Wish
About the game: Legends say that the one who succeeds in climbing the tower of God will be granted a wish. Will you be the one to succeed? Tower of God is a match-3 game with fun mechanics and enjoyable Game play. The levels are varied and fun. The game also includes mini-games such as Hidden Object, Jigsaw, Memory and Slider. Pick up and play 100 levels of fun match making Fun mini games included New types of runes and tiles Climb the tower of God!
